label: 色紙
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: In the Heian period, the term shikishi (now a square poem card") seems to have meant any piece of paper, regardless of color, shpae, or size, that was designed primarily for use in recording poetry (p. 301)."
